ARABIC: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In this way We give you news of what has gone before and We have given you a reminder direct from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus do We narrate some account to you of what has gone before, and We have truly given you a Reminder of Our own.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), thus do We recount to you the events of the past, and We have bestowed upon you from Ourself an admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus We tell you, (Muhammad), the stories of the past and We have given you the Quran.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We relate the former tidings to you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); and We have given you a Remembrance* from Ourselves. (*The Holy Qur’an.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus We relate to you some information of what happened before. And indeed We have given you from Us a Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus do We relate to you (some) of the news of what has gone before; and indeed We have given to you a Reminder from Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We relate to thee stories of what has gone before, and We have given thee a remembrance from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus relate We unto thee (Muhammad) some tidings of that which happened of old, and We have given thee from Our presence a reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus We relate to you the history of past events, and We have given you a reminder [the Quran] from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus We recount unto thee some tidings of that which hath preceded; and surely We have vouchsafed unto thee from before Us an admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus do We relate to you some accounts of what is past. Certainly, We have given you a Reminder from Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus do We relate to thee some stories of what happened before: for We have sent thee a Message from Our own Presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus We relate to you (O Muhammad SAW) some information of what happened before. And indeed We have given you from Us a Reminder (this Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And so We narrate to you the stories of the past, and We have given you a remembrance from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We narrate to you reports of times gone by; and We have given you a message from Our Presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:99] Thus, just as We have related to you O Muhammad (s) this story, We relate to you some stories, [some] accounts, of what is past, of communities, and We have given you from Ourselves a Reminder, a Qur’ān.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus relate Who unto thee) in this way we sent you, Muhammad, Gabriel with (some tidings of that which happened of old) with the events of past nations, (and We have given thee from Our presence a Reminder) We have honoured you with the Qur'an which contains the events of past and future generations.
